segments.text: I see the water pouring over the edge of the sink, and it’s only getting worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman doesn’t seem to care, and that’s frustrating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are sneaking cookies, and the floor is a slippery mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long this has been going on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to fall any second now, and the woman won’t even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s more focused on that plate than anything else in the room.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so innocent, just waiting for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how careless everyone is being right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is going to ruin everything if it keeps flowing like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone intervenes before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
